name: BtMiracles
description: Bt Miracles is a fantasy hero metaverse based on BSC (Binance Smart Chain). It is more than an interesting game, but also a metaverse with a complete business ecosystem. Our mission is to provide players with an interesting and profitable NFT game. Players can summon students, who can fight, grow, and upgrade. In the world of Bt Miracles, entertainment can be business, and business can also be entertainment. BM is token of Bt Miracles, we are dedicated to build the most valuable NFT social network gaming metaverse and creating a win-win Bt Miracles ecosystem. Letâ€™s create our future and witness the glory together!
